body_html:
relocation R_X86_64_32 against `.rodata.str1.1' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC

Adding -fPIC to the options in the cuda crosstool might do the trick. Sorry I cannot do much here, it's a C++ related issue, not really related to bazel
body_text:
relocation R_X86_64_32 against `.rodata.str1.1' can not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
